Back to Frédéric Chopin

Frédéric Chopin

Trois nouvelles études, KK IIb/3

1839 · Chomiński 38–40 · Brown 130

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 6' 30"

  • 1. F minor
  • 2. A-flat major
  • 3. D-flat major

Some sources swap the order of the second and third études.

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 124 · Etüden · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Henle · HN 229 · Etüden · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • National Edition · 2 (A II) · Etudes · ed. Jan Ekier
  • Peters · EP 73229 · ed. Roy Howat
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50205 · Sämtliche Etüden · ed. Paul Badura-Skoda

1. F minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

2. A-flat major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

3. D-flat major

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3.5
